content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Li. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am looking forward to discussing the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 25 Euros per month. I am a student and I want to live in the city center. I want to be on good terms with the landlord, I am dependable and responsible. Do you have any questions?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for providing that information, Mr. Li. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I am happy to hear that you have a budget of 25 Euros per month. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I will need to consider your budget in relation to the market rate for similar apartments in the city center. May I ask if you have any previous experience with renting apartments in New York City?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, I have never rented an apartment in New York. I am new to the city. But I am a responsible person and I am willing to pay the market rate if it is reasonable. I want to be on good terms with the landlord and I am willing to negotiate.

Do you have any other questions?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Li. Based on my research, the market rate for a 25-square-meter apartment in the city center is around 300 Euros per month. However, I am willing to consider your budget and negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable rental price. Would you be willing to pay 25 Euros per month for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
